data: summit of Apache Leap | valley below

The day had dawned on the summit of Apache Leap and a golden eagle, wheeling high above the crags, flashed back the fire of the sun from his wings; but in the valley below where old Pinal lay sleeping the heat had not begun.
Silver and Gold: A Story of Luck and Love in a Western Mining Camp
